name: Ippo And The Starfruit Tree
description:
Ippo has been asked by the elders of his village to save the dying starfruit tree. Help him collect the scattered fruit to give back to the tree before it's too late! Oh no! Enemies have begun to surround the tree, and it's up to Ippo to defeat them!

Use the Arrow keys to help Ippo climb the Starfruit Tree!

Credits:

Player Sprite, Enemy Sprite, and Tilemap: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/abstract-platformer

Music: https://incompetech.com/wordpress/2015/09/kawai-kitsune/

All other sprites and art were created by PurpleWarCaster
